entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change DefaultAutomaticDecompression to DecompressionMethods.All #108163
  • JsonElement vs JsonDocument Parse: why no UseArrayPools #108157
  • Access violation with Native AOT when calling an abstract property #108154
  • Frequency of Metrics report #108152
  • [WASI][socket] WriteTimeout, ReadTimeout missing #108151
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding headers with a method #108148
  • Application freezes during GC #108144
    Future
  • `NetworkCredential` method parameters nullability do not match `ICredentials` and `ICredentialsByHost` #108134
  • [API Proposal]: Hooking into service construction in default DI implementation #108132
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108129
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108128
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionContainerCycleTests.APostDependsOnBNone_ShouldNotThrow #108127
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108126
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #108125
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: managed/Compilation/Compilation/Compilation.cmd #108124
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.cmd #108123
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback/Callback.cmd #108122
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108121
  • .net8 ver8.0.8 Desktop Crash 0x80131506 #108118

Closed

  • ConfigurationBuilder: multiple JSON sources results in badly-handled top-level lists #108138
    Future
  • IdnMapping.GetAscii and GetUnicode throw ArgumentException on Linux #107900
    10.0.0
  • .Net9 RC1 Crash when creating Java Runtime through interop (and also .Net9 all previews) #107651
    9.0.0
  • Updating to .net 6 causes higher lock contention #108057
  • Test failure:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttributeTests.ImportIndexers_ShouldThrowSomething #108130
  • Potential memory leak in ep_file_write_event error path #107970
    10.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works with AOT but does not work with JIT for a type of Class<float> shape #108046
  • `ThreadPoolWorkQueue..ctor` randomly will never return #104322
    10.0.0
  • Deadlock in ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads() during app start. #93175
    10.0.0
  • Deadlock in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.FrameworkEventSource on application startup #105682
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105980
    9.0.0
  • CS8795 on GeneratedRegex attributed method #108133
  • Confusing API for taking items from BlockingCollection #108054
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: allow ref struct for linq Select method #108131

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix createdump 'stack smashing detected' error on arm64 #108166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • remove dead code from BCL.cs #108165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix switchrecognition for jitstress #108161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove a lock contention test #108155
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `Process.Threads` by PSS APIs for >=Win 10 #108146
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    needs-area-label
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize `Dictionary<>.TryInsert()` by using `ref var` #108119
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add FreeBSD as valid test host. #106302
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix typos #108116
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Document Important Note About the Host and the CLR for Testing #108162
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108091
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete unused RedirectFunctor abstraction #108113
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid lock contention during thread creation of thread pool #108135
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add new properties for the new non-JSON-based deb tooling #107429
    blocking, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107965
    area-Extensions-Options
  • [release/9.0] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108088
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 129.0.6668.58, windows: 129.0.6668.59 #108105
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Issue a deprecation warning for COMPlus_ prefix #107759
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
